title: Extend network API to give more info (MAC address, WIFI details)
body: In order to display more details on network connection, and to distinguish WiFi networks connected to.

comments.body: Would also be useful to have elements such as cell provider name, signal strength (cell and wifi), etc. exposed.
Can be used to locate the user inside a large infrastructure such as a university where AGPS can hardly help without private WiFi data.
I need MAC address. Because the router have mac filter
